QuestData.Title: The Heart of Azeroth
QuestData.Description:
Our world's dyin', $n. Sargeras's sword has cut deep. Her pain is drivin' the elements into a frenzy!
I can hear Azeroth's voice, but she needs more than her speaker.
She needs her champion.
Far below us lies an ancient titan vault called the Chamber of Heart. I sense she wishes tae speak tae ye there.
Come with me into the chamber. It may be our only chance tae save her!
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel to the Chamber of Heart and commune with Azeroth.
QuestData.CompletionText: Ye need tae hear from Azeroth herself, $n.
QuestData.RewardText: The Heart of Azeroth... that's the key tae healin' her wounds!

Objectives.Objective: Use device in Silithus to travel to Chamber of the Heart
Witness past events on titan console
Speak to Magni within the Chamber of Heart
